contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Sparta|sparti}} '''[[Sparta]]''' was a prominent city-state in ancient Greece. '''Sparta''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}} == Places == ;Canada * [[Sparta, Ontario]], a historic village ;United States * [[Sparta, Georgia]], a city * [[Sparta, Illinois]], a city * [[Sparta, Indiana]], an unincorporated community * [[Sparta, Kentucky]], a city * [[Sparta, Michigan]], a village * [[Sparta, Mississippi]], an unincorporated community * [[Sparta, Missouri]], a city * [[Sparta, New Jersey]], a township * [[Sparta, New York]], a township, Livingston County * [[Sparta, North Carolina]] * [[Sparta, Ohio]], a village * [[Sparta, Tennessee]], a city * [[Sparta, Wisconsin]], a city * [[Sparta (town), Wisconsin]] == Sports == * [[Sparta (athletic club)]], a Danish athletic club * [[AC Sparta Prague]], a Czech football team * [[HC Sparta Praha]], a Czech ice hockey team * [[Sparta Rotterdam]], a Dutch football team * [[IL Sparta]], a Norwegian multi-sport club ** [[Sparta Warriors]], ice hockey team of IL Sparta * [[Sparta (racehorse)]], failed to complete the [[1848 Grand National]] == Other uses == * [[Sparta (album)|''Sparta'' (album)]], an album by M.O.P. * [[Sparta (band)]], a band formed by ex-members of At the Drive-In * [[Sparta (magazine)|''Sparta'' (magazine)]], a journal of ancient Spartan and Greek history * [[Sparta (rocket)]] * [[SPARTA, Inc.]], a United States defense contractor * [[Sparta (moth)|''Sparta'' (moth)]], a moth genus * ''[[Ancient Wars: Sparta]]'', a real-time strategy computer game * Sparta, a brand of cigarettes from former [[Czechoslovakia]] * ''Sparta'', a fictional planet in the [[CoDominium (book series)|CoDominium]] series of books by Jerry Pournelle * ''Sparta'', a fictional planet in [[A. Bertram Chandler]]'s ''"A Spartan Planet" == See also == * [[Sparti]], a city on the site of Sparta in Laconia * [[Spartoi]] or Sparti, a group of mythical beings figuring in the founding myths of the ancient Greek city of Thebes * [[Nueva Esparta]], a state in Venezuela * [[Nueva Esparta, El Salvador]] * [[Esparta]], a municipality in the Honduras * [[Isparta]], a city in Turkey * [[Sparta Township (disambiguation)]] * [[Spartan (disambiguation)]] * [[Spata (disambiguation)]] * [[Laconia (disambiguation)]] * {{lookfrom|Sparta}} * {{intitle|Sparta}} {{disambiguation|geo}}
